meanings.definition: To cease or abstain from an action.
meanings.sent1: He decided to desist from playing video games to focus on studying.
meanings.sent2: The company warned the employee to desist from sharing confidential information.
meanings.sent3: The robot malfunctioned, desisting from following its programmed commands.
meanings.sent4: The river desisted from flowing after a dam was built upstream.
meanings.sent5: The athlete was desisting from eating junk food to maintain peak performance.
